summary: This mod aims to add attack speed upgrades to the Two-Handed skill tree
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to add attack speed upgrades to the Two-Handed skill tree 
by modifying the barbarian perk to make it as follows
level 1 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage and are 10% faster
level 2 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage and are 15% faster
level 3 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage and are 20% faster
level 4 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage and are 25% faster
level 5 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage and are 30% faster
author: InFamous935
